And do u know that in uncensored episodes sinchan use to say to his mother ( bachche churane walli moti budiya / fat old lady who steals kids) ðŸ˜‚ ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚

Every morning when shin chan wakesup half~a~sleep and seeâ€™s his dad he says :-

Oh ! Mujhe lagta hai maine apko kahi dekha hai ðŸ˜¶ ðŸ˜…ðŸ˜…

this one is epic :

Haati mera haati ,mera pyaara hati !ðŸ˜ðŸ˜ðŸ·ðŸ·ðŸ½ðŸ½

A weird 5 years old kid making the whole world roll~over~the floor laughing.

ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜…ðŸ˜…ðŸ˜…

We all love shin~chan for his brazen replies,witty nature & his beyond age flirting.

Few questions has arried in the air after the death of the maker of shin~chan (Yoshita Usu). Real story just came out to be depressive.

Why shin~chan anime was made?

Why name of the series is â€œcrayon Shin~chan?

Is shin chan going to end with the death of him?

Why â€˜ shinkoâ€™ has no background story , why it is mentioned that sheâ€™s from future ?

Is it true that shin chan and Hemawaari were real characters,and they both dead? ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­

Before you gothrough the real depressive content which will tear u apart .

Shinchan is a real life story of a Japanese family called â€œNoharaâ€™s familyâ€

It is said that one day shinko just gave a paper to shinchan ,written â€œtake care of Himawariâ€ as if she knows what is going to happen & gave hints about death of both~ofâ€™em.

IS SHIN~CHAN REALLY DEAD ?

The story is that of Misae and her family. Her family consisted of her husband, her kids Shin Chan, Himawaari and their cute little pet Shiro. One day, Shin Chan and Himawari went to the market with their parents for their usual grocery shopping.

Suddenly, Shin Chan observed that his little sister Himawari was crossing the street without any assistance. He ran in order to rescue her. But unfortunately, they met with an accident and both died.

Misae got very depressed after this incident. So, she began depicting the lives of her kids on a scrap-book with crayon of shin chan. Thatâ€™s also the reason why this show is called â€˜Crayon Shin Chanâ€™

She used to imagine how her son and daughter life would had ,if alive.

â€•â€•>click here background music<â€•â€•

This story inspired Yoshita Usui (the illustrator of the serial) so much that he decided to create an anime by the name Crayon Shin Chan.

Yes, all of those sassy, light-hearted moments that we saw on the television were actually the creations of Shin Chanâ€™s mother.

The story that made us laugh so hard is actually the result of a tragic incident.

Also in the last episose Shin Chan dieds.

Supposedly, he dies while saving his little sister and the producers decided to cancel the broadcast because they found it to be too depressing.

Now that i know about the tragic death of â€œShin~chanâ€ , what should I do / how should i laugh again on his stupid joke ðŸ˜­

*fallâ€™s on knees crying ðŸ˜­*
